attributes.action: set up a statutory enquiry into Origin Housing group Limited
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a formal request that H M Government grants our request for a statutory enquiry into the affairs of Origin Housing Group Limited (trading as SP & HHA Ltd, SPH, SPH Housing, SPH Housing Association, All pay, ALL PAY LIMITED) and its contractors Capita group plc and T H Kenyon & Sons plc and its associateds by 31.03.09

rejection.details: It is impossible to understand why such an inquiry should take place and what it has to do with the Government and Government policy.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
